title: SDET Fundamentals
description: Core concepts and principles of Software Development Engineer in Test

title: API Testing
description: REST API testing and validation techniques

title: Introduction to SDET
description: Learn the fundamentals of Software Development Engineer in Test role and responsibilities

children.text: This comprehensive course introduces you to the world of Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET). You'll learn the core principles, methodologies, and tools that make SDETs essential in modern software development.

learningObjectives: Understand the SDET role and responsibilities
Learn testing methodologies and best practices

title: What is an SDET?
description: Understanding the role and responsibilities of a Software Development Engineer in Test

children.text: A Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET) is a professional who combines software development skills with testing expertise to ensure high-quality software delivery.

quiz.question: What does SDET stand for?
quiz.explanation: SDET stands for Software Development Engineer in Test, combining development and testing skills.

title: SDET vs QA Engineer
description: Understanding the differences between SDET and traditional QA roles

children.text: While both SDETs and QA Engineers focus on quality, their approaches and skill sets differ significantly.
